name: metamorphoser
description: You play as trans boy college student Carter who meets a mysteriously alluring new student called Isaac and the two enter into a dangerous relationship. While trying to organise his feelings for Isaac, Carter hears about strange happenings around college: ghost stories, missing students, and odd reports of rotting flesh in the science labâ€¦ The closer he gets to figuring out Isaac, the closer he gets to being in serious danger. Will he survive to find out the truth? Or will he turn into just another story of a missing student?
